item.title: One-armed robber
item.description:
About This Game

Experience the challenge of robbing banks, but now with only one arm! Grab a friend and you'll have two arms in total.



Unlock and buy new guns, which can be customized to fit your playstyle. If you are trying to go stealth, the optimal choice might be a suppressor, but if you're going loud, damage and bullets is all that matters, so put on an extended mag and get going!



Each heist is suited for any playstyle, whether you want to sneak in and take out guards quietly, or you go in guns blazing shooting everthing in your sight until you reach the vault, the choice is yours.

As you become a more experienced robber new tools will be unlocked, which will make it easier for you to complete the heists. Each tool has a special purpose, and unique tools make it possible to complete heists in new ways you couldn't do before.



Whether you go loud or stealth, once you are in the vault, the objective is the same: Gather as much loot as possible, and get out alive!
If you can't fit all the loot in the vault in your duffel bag, you can either run back to the truck and get a new one, or get your friends to help you carry out everything!

item.title: (the) Gnorp Apologue
item.description:
About This Game

(the) Gnorp Apologue is a game where you help small beings called gnorps get rich. It is a unique incremental game with interesting upgrades, and visuals to match the numbers.



Hit the rock
What is the rock? Irrelevant question — when struck, it outputs shards, and shards are amazing. They allow you to purchase and upgrade gnorps, and build new structures. The gnorps must have them. Hitting the rock is only half the battle, however, as the gnorps must retrieve the shards before they can use them.



Acquire and upgrade gnorps
Gnorps represent the heart of the game. They are responsible for both shard generation and collection. Gnorps adapt varying methodologies to reach their goal. Some slam the rock with their heads, others shoot it with arrows and guns. You have gnorps that grow flowers, and gnorps that use psychic powers. They even build rockets and drones. All for a single purpose — the accumulation of shards.



A strategic incremental
(the) Gnorp Apologue is about making numbers goes up, but how you do that is up to you. At your disposal:
- All the gnorps, with their varying strengths and weaknesses
- Upgrades that enhance and modify both gnorps structures and gnorps
- The Talent Stone, offering unlocks that allow for extreme, synergetic effects
- Status effects to enhance and modify shard generation
- A special resource, Zybellium, that can greatly enhance your gnorps



If you enjoy theorizing about and executing builds in games, this game is for you.



Will you help the gnorps?

item.title: House Flipper 2
item.description:
About This Game





It doesn't matter if you're a makeover veteran or if you're only starting out - you'll feel at home in no time!
House Flipper 2 introduces new mechanics and revamps the ones from the original game.
The good old hammer, the trusty paint roller, and the sturdy mop, all await your return! The new visuals make our fixer-uppers look crisp as never before!




Why renovate a house when you can just build one? Unleash your creativity in the Sandbox Mode! Use it to recreate real-life buildings or design projects that exist in your imagination.
Remember: building from scratch is no easy task! But let's face it, it's definitely worth putting in extra effort to design the house of your dreams.




Between the mountain tops and the endless sea, there lies the town of Pinnacove.
A place where time slows down, and the friendly residents are ready to entrust you with their homes.
Can you discover some of the stories within these walls?
Your old pal Tom, who seems to know everybody in the neighborhood, will gladly share some local knowledge with you.




In House Flipper 2, you are the foreman!
You get to decide what 'relaxing gameplay' means!
Do you enjoy building? Choose the Sandbox Mode which allows you to construct houses from scratch. Or maybe you prefer cleaning and decorating? In the Story Mode, you will delve into long and engaging renovation projects, as well as deal with some quick jobs.
Sit back and relax, here comes the new age of House Flipper!

item.title: Ready or Not
item.description:
About This Game

Los Sueños – The LSPD reports a massive upsurge in violent crime across the greater Los Sueños area. Special Weapons and Tactics (SWAT) teams have been dispatched to respond to various scenes involving high-risk hostage situations, active bomb threats, barricaded suspects, and other criminal activities. Citizens are being advised to practice caution when traveling the city or to stay at home.

It has been noted that while Los Sueños is still seen as a city where riches can be found, for many more the finer things in life are becoming less and less obtainable. “The city is sprawling with cramped high-rise apartments and decaying affordable housing, which has been exploited by the criminal underground like a malevolent parasite,” states Chief Galo Álvarez. “In a city where people are just trying to survive, lawful action from the LSPD and the LSPD SWAT team remains an integral force preventing the stretched thin social fabric in this city from snapping under this chaotic strain.”

In response to the burgeoning violent crime wave inundating Los Sueños, Chief Álvarez of the LSPD has enlisted the stalwart support of David ‘Judge’ Beaumont as the Commander of the LSPD SWAT team. Shortly following this announcement, the LSPD has also confirmed active recruitment for additional talent to join this specialized tactical police unit with the mission of bringing peace back to the city.

“This assignment is not for the faint of heart,” comments Commander Beaumont, “Extremists, crooked politicians, countless weapons, human trafficking, and illicit drugs and pornography… the world of policing in Los Sueños is fraught with real and harsh realities, realities that the everyday person isn’t necessarily confronted with. These are realities that you will need to navigate with your team within the proper bounds of the law or face the consequences and make matters worse.”

The Los Sueños Policed Department has officially posted new details on Commander “Judge” Beaumont’s updated assignment with the LSPD SWAT team:

New Expectations: Whether this is your first time in Los Sueños or not, the city has changed and so too have the tools and methods with which we conduct our work. The haunts you might have seen or heard about are re-imagined, and so have the angles with which we approach each call. Furthermore, we’ve received reports that identify at least 4 new high-risk police districts which we suspect may require future tactical intervention, plus at least 4 existing high-risk districts that underwent massive upheavals.

Take Command: The role of the Commander of the LSPD SWAT is to compose their team from a large roster with unique talents, give tactical orders, meticulously plan, and carry out missions. Commanders are obligated to conduct each mission with integrity and look after their team’s mental and physical health. Officers with unaddressed deteriorating mental status may be unable to properly perform their duties or even feel compelled to quit the force. Incapacitated officers may be temporarily unavailable for missions, with the tragic prospect of death leading to a permanent loss. For SWAT Commanders in unusual circumstances based on individual choices they opt for, deadly mistakes may lead to their own permanent fatality.

SWAT Team Quality Enhancement: Much anticipated improved SWAT training procedures, tactics, and experience in the LSPD has led to an overall increase in the quality and quantity of officers in our roster. Expanded tactical versatility allows our officers to take on any challenge with renewed confidence, blending coordination and independence seamlessly. There is also additional basic training now available to SWAT members to keep foundational knowledge and muscle memory in top shape.

Equipment and customization: We have access to the best weapons and equipment that the LSPD can offer to fulfill our exceptionally dangerous role, including many new acquisitions. However, customization isn’t limited to the equipment we use. Through close-knit comradery while performing remarkable actions alongside the team, you’ll earn the clothes you wear, the patches on your sleeves, the artwork that may adorn your skin, and potentially even the timepiece on your wrist. Lastly, we have overhauled our headquarters' training facilities to better test our loadouts before heading out on call.

item.title: Taora : Beginning
item.description:
About This Game


Taora is an island that is infested with zombies and hold many places to explore and loot.

You can build your base, craft and upgrade your gear, explore many unique places, loot materials or gears. You can upgrade your vehicle to suit your needs.

Upgrade you characters` skills to fit different conditions like hacking electronics, reapiring broken things, healing the wounded or fighting with zombies.




Looting:

Loot materials needed for crafting, base building etc.

Vehicles:

There are many vehicles for you to use on Taora.

Crafting:

You can craft and upgrade your gears, vehicles, weapons, armors that make you a real survivor.

Open World:

You can hop on your vehicle and explore unique places on Taora.

Survive:

Shoot and kill as many zombies as you can to survive.

Base Building:

It is important to build your base to survive on Taora. You can store your loot and weapons on your base, build various tools or tables that help you to improve your weapons, vehicles and survivors.

Skills:

Skill up your character on different aspects, they can be a soldier to kill hordes of zombies, or a mechanic that can craft tools, disarm traps, unlock safes.

item.title: Against the Storm
item.description:
About This Game

You are the Viceroy – a leader charged by the Scorched Queen to reclaim the wilderness and discover lost riches for the Smoldering City, civilization's last bastion against the Blightstorm that destroyed the old world. Unlike most survival city builders where your focus is on a single city, in Against the Storm you must build a vast, prosperous network of settlements populated by diverse fantasy races, each with their own specializations and needs.

The wilderness holds many hidden dangers, and never-ending storms will batter your population into submission. If your settlements should fall, then the expedition may end – but not the game. Against the Storm is a roguelite city builder, meaning you will carry forward the resources, upgrades, and experience of your past expeditions each time you set off for a new journey into the wild.





Foxes, Beavers, and lizards stand alongside humans and harpies in the struggle to survive. Utilize each group's strengths as you balance their varying needs, from housing and culinary preferences to taste in luxuries and recreation. Will you manufacture raincoats, brew ale, and bake pies to boost morale in the face of the oppressive hostility of the forest, or will you prioritize the needs of one species over another to operate more swiftly for the Scorched Queen?





Experience core city builder gameplay enhanced by roguelite replayability. Build and manage multiple settlements spread out across a large world map, all while collecting valuable meta-progression resources to upgrade the Smoldering City. Feel the pressure of an expectant monarch as the Scorched Queen demands constant progress while recurring Blightstorms pose an inevitable threat to your settlements. Manage your reputation to secure your success at any one settlement before moving on to establish another, constantly seeking new opportunities for growth, taking on unique challenges across multiple biomes, and bracing for the inevitable destruction of everything but the Smoldering City itself. How will you maximize each cycle to not just ensure the best fate for the Smoldering City, but for your career as Viceroy as well?





With hundreds of gameplay modifiers and 6 distinct biomes, every city location presents unique challenges for even the most resourceful Viceroy. Adjust your strategy to changing weather conditions and experiment with rosters of building blueprints and perks that can help your society thrive or bring it to ruin. Will you take on and complete additional objectives and delve deeper into the dangerous forest for potential boons, or will you approach with caution to ensure you operate within your capabilities? All the while, you never know what wares the Trader will bring next year, and the forest holds treasures and resources, but also ancient threats.





Laying the foundations for a new city is one of the most exciting moments in a city-building game. In Against the Storm, you'll have the opportunity to repeatedly experience this by creating new settlements, while still interacting with your network of previously established cities in a growing world.

item.title: PROJECT 13
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to Project 13, a unique Walking Simulator that challenges your perception and instincts in an repeating Psych Ward Corridor. In this immersive experience, you step into the shoes of a disposable Probant, devoid of rights and a future, tasked with navigating a mysterious, repeating Psych Ward Corridor.

Your objective is clear: report any anomalies encountered during your walks. The catch? A single mistake means starting anew. Only by consistently reporting accurately can you progress through the enigmatic corridors.

Key Features:

Repeating Hospital Corridor: Explore a hauntingly repetitive environment, where each step could lead to discovery or deception.

Over 35 Anomalies: Uncover the secrets hidden within the corridor as you encounter over 35 unique anomalies. Stay vigilant, for every detail matters.

Confirmation After Each Walk: After each expedition, confirm whether you experienced any anomalies. Your accuracy determines your fate.

Escape on the 13th Walk: Success lies in your ability to navigate the corridors and accurately report anomalies. Reach the 13th walk unscathed, and you may find the elusive exit.

Variable Duration: The game's duration is unpredictable, ranging from 40 minutes to "a lot longer." Sharpen your eyesight and hone your sense for anomalies to expedite your escape.

Embark on this surreal journey where reality blurs, and your decisions shape your destiny. Are you ready to unravel the mysteries of Project 13 and defy the odds stacked against you? The corridors await – enter if you dare.

item.title: Table Tennis Toon!
item.description:
About This Game


Table Tennis Toon! is a fast-paced table tennis game. The peculiarity is that unlike other ping pong games you can aim precisely thanks to the movable viewfinder on the table. The quality of your shots depends completely on your positioning and timing.
Use five different types of shot or a combination of these!
Yes, you read right! You can make a shot combining Topspin and Rightspin effects for example!
The five shots are:
  • Accuracy Shot
  • Topspin
  • Backspin
  • Sidespin Right
  • Sidespin Left



Try different characters, everyone with his unique set of stats!
There are four stats:
  • Speed
  • Power
  • Control
  • Effects
Will you choose a balanced character or will you go with a specialized one?




Play in split-screen with your friends for the best experience.
There is nothing more satisfying than smashing the ball against your friend or hitting the edge of the table at the set point!

item.title: Slime, Fire and Soul
item.description:
About This Game

You enter the DUNGEON and try to get as far as possible. There are three main types of enemies; SLIME, FIRE and SOUL.

You have only one life per run. Be careful in the DUNGEON, you might get slaughtered by the Grand Wizard SOUL Eater!

SOUL enemies are the most dangerous thing in the DUNGEON... or are they? Dive into this bullet-hell action, collect items and buy upgrades from merchants!

item.title: 2 Volt
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome 2 Volt, the sequel to Volt.

You are refurbished and recharged lithium-ion battery and somehow found yourself back in a fully automated manufacturing facility.

2 Volt is a single-player puzzle game and your goal on each level is to reach the exit.
Use electric beams to Interact with environment and discover its secrets.

  • Solve puzzles using logic, timing, and skill.
  • Discover and earn achievements.
  • Experience the physically based world of 2 Volt

item.title: MR 333 II: Planetbirth
item.description:
About This Game

After leaving the portal you are taken HOME. Home of origin will require you to seal off entities linked from escape portal. It will not take long for them to follow back, and thus opening the doorway for MR 333. Failure to complete the ritual you embarked on will open your home to the being and his entities wish to ensure this happens. The only way to seal off and continue the ritual is to birth a prison planet in their realm, a place where the vibrations can hold them and not give them reign in yours. Become pregnant, birth a planet and seal off the entities.

MR 333 II: Planetbirth features a first person perspective with frantic gameplay requiring you to locate items, fight entities and run from enemies existing in your realm.

Navigate the house after returning "Home" and explore the surrounding areas. Rebuke entities and run from those corrupted. Become pregnant with the planetary fertile snake and fight the entities through each trimester.

This is a small sequel to MR 333 that features an additional level to take place directly after the completion of the ritual from the previous game.

item.title: Always Surrender
item.description:
About This Game

Always Surrender is a vertically scrolling shoot 'em up score attack, with an emphasis on pushing your luck as far as you can. Last as long as possible against an endless horde of enemies and then surrender in order to bank the bonus. Giving up has never been so rewarding. Collecting medals increased the multiplier, as well as contributing to the regualary increasing bonus score, and can be vacuumed up by not firing for a short period of time.

Features

  • Six game modes:
    1. Normal - Face an onslaught of enemies with just one life, but surrender before it's too late to escape and keep the bonus score.
    2. Novice - Like normal, but when you want an easier time (to begin with).
    3. Timed - 3 minutes, infinite lives and bombs, to score as much as you can. The multiplier resets when you bomb, how long can you hold off?
    4. Classic - 3 lives, 3 bombs, no surrender.
    5. Expert - One life, but the enemies are harder. If you don't surrender you don't score.
    6. Pacifist - No shooting allowed, score more for staying alive as long as possible. Enemies and bullets are grazeable to increase the mutliplier.
  • Lots of enemies to kill.
  • Plenty of bullets, and lasers, to dodge.
  • A slow motion system that can kick in when the danger is too close, making the player temporarily invincible.
  • Hidden methods to spawn more medals to collect...
  • A dedicated button to giving up (well in four of the modes).
  • Tate support.
  • Customisable UI.
  • Leaderboards & achievements.

item.title: Zarathustra - Cybergeddon
item.description:
About This Game

In the aftermath of The Inflection, a momentous event that unveiled cosmic truths and alien technology, two religious factions emerge: the Church of Flesh, embracing chaos and free will, and the Church of Neon, upholding order and stability.

Amy, an FBI agent affiliated with the Church of Neon, carries with her a unique asset: a cybernetic implant housing the consciousness of a past individual—you, the player.

Together, you navigate the complexities of a case involving a book stolen from the Church of Flesh. This investigation is set against the backdrop of a world grappling with the implications of its newfound enlightenment and the delicate balance between these two divergent philosophies.



Zarathustra is a classic point and click adventure with inventory and dialog puzzles.

It's a rather casual experience with no dead-ends or overly difficult puzzles.





Currently "Day1,2 and 3" are available - about five hours of gameplay. The following day(s) will be released if people show interest in the project.

item.title: Tiny Tank: Operation Phoenix
item.description:
About This Game

Tiny Tank: Operation Phoenix Lore:
1 year after the Empire attacked. The small group of resisted fights managed to capture a small village on the outskirts of the empires main tank factory. It's up to this group of resisted fighters to push through and stall the empires forces for as long as possible.

Key Features:
The era of Tiny Tank continues! Tiny Tank is a Classic Hero Shooter, in this game you only have one objective and that is to… SURVIVE! Hold out and battle the hordes of enemies with each wave being harder than the last.

  • Upgrade System
  • Boss Battles
  • Unlimited Ammo
  • Huge Rage of Enemy Types
  • Low-poly Art Style
  • Classes
  • Support Streak System
  • Resource Gathering
  • Wave Based Gameplay
  • Environmental Dangers

item.title: Abstracto
item.description:
About This Game

Abstracto is a Retro-Inspired, Hack N' Slash, Combat-Oriented Platformer, with a deep combat system that lets you play your way. Play as Forte a blue square on a quest to defeat the evil Immotus and save the strange land of the Abstract. Armed with a powerful sword from his creator the Structor, Forte must fight through the dilapidated Abstract and gain new stones to power up his sword. On the way Forte will need to learn to fight the various creatures of the abstract and make peace with some others. Master the combat systems of Abstracto to perform some long satisfying combos and link into powerful attacks.

*Defeat enemies to gain "Materia".
*Use "Materia" to buy new attacks and abilities.
*Combo enemies-until they break to increase "Materia" gained.
*Defeat bosses to get stones to use in your sword.
*Swap stones mid-combo to suit your needs.
*Release the attack button just before an attack comes out to enhance your attacks.
*Block attacks as they hit to Parry. Parrying negates all damage and even reflects projectiles.
*Feeling overwhelmed? Cancel your attacks with a well timed parry.
*3 Unlockable characters
*80 Levels
*4 Difficulties

item.title: Jigsaw-Land
item.description:
About This Game

Info
A relaxing single player 3D puzzle game with procedurally generated puzzles, where you combine together pieces to compose beautiful landscape.

Many puzzles to solve

Different biomes and different puzzles, create many puzzles to solve.

High replayability

Each puzzle is procedurally generated, which gives you the ability to play and replay the same puzzle.

Stop to admire the solved puzzle

Use the view rotation to enjoy the completed puzzle that comes to life.

item.title: Galaxy Raiders
item.description:
About This Game

In the game "Galaxy Raiders" you will find yourself in the role of a spaceship captain, you will have to travel to different parts of the galaxy, completing various missions. Your ship is equipped with various weapons that will help you cope with enemy attacks and destroy opponents.

In addition, you will have to complete tasks to search and collect parts, as well as repair a space station that was damaged by enemy ships. To overcome all the difficulties and obstacles that come your way, you will have to use all the weapons of your ship.

Game Features:
- Beautiful pixel graphics
- Various tasks
- Good soundtrack

item.title: Jungle Bloody Operation
item.description:
About This Game

Jungle: Bloody Operation: An exciting adventure awaits you in a dangerous and mysterious deep forest. Your character, Jake, finds himself in the thick of the wild, separated from his squad. Now he has to survive in this gloomy and hostile environment.

Jake will have to face various types of dangers, including aggressive animals, poisonous bugs and even zombies that seem to come from the darkest part of the jungle at night.

The game is a top-down TDS shooter where you have to shoot from many waves of dangerous creatures!

Every step in this hellish terrain is a test, and only the strongest and most skillful will be able to overcome all difficulties and reach their squad.

Are you ready for this challenge?

item.title: MAGIC DUCK
item.description:
About This Game

Magic monsters have filled the world, it's up to you to protect it from dark forces. In the game "MAGIC DUCK" you will take on the role of an amazing magical duck with a magic hat that has amazing magical powers. An exciting adventure awaits you in which you will fight against fire dragons and other magical creatures.

The game is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements.

You will travel through various locations, including dark forests, tangled plains and dangerous passages, where danger lurks at every turn. Fight monsters and save the world from evil forces!

Game Features:
- Pixel graphics
- Various levels and enemies
- Good soundtrack

item.title: Search of Magic Ore
item.description:
About This Game

Search of Magic Ore - This is a story about an ordinary resident whose village is constantly under attack by warriors from neighboring villages or ordinary forest monsters. Your blacksmith is running out of magic ore, and without it you won’t be able to get new equipment. Go to the magical forest, eliminate as many enemies as possible and bring back magical ore!

As you travel through the forest, you encounter magical enemies such as dragons, evil goblins and dark wizards. Your task is to use your skills and weapons to defeat them and mine the magic ore, which is the source to your victory.

The game is a mixture of RPG and Rogue-like game, you find yourself in a vast location where your main goal is to complete the task and move further along the level.

Game Features:
- Nice pixel graphics
- Various locations and enemies
- Good soundtrack

item.title: Demonic Astal
item.description:
About This Game

Demonic Astal - As a brave demon hunter, go to the demonic world to find a magical portal. You must go down the floors in search of a portal, overcoming various obstacles and fighting dangerous creatures to become stronger.

The game is a 2D platformer, you need to clear out enemies in the location and go to the magical portal to move to the next level.

The levels of the demonic world are presented in varied and exciting locations, each of which offers unique challenges and dangers. You have to use your skills to stay alive and find the way to the magical portal.

item.title: BEST FIGHTER
item.description:
About This Game

BEST FIGHTER is an exciting game where you fight with the most experienced fighters in search of glory and recognition. Use a wide arsenal of weapons - from blasters and firearms to axes and brass knuckles - to overcome your opponents. Choose unique tactics and strategies to survive in the arena and rise to the top of the rankings. Show off your skills and become a true martial arts legend!

Accept the challenge, overcome all obstacles and become a real warrior who can go through all the trials to achieve glory and the title of 'Legend'

Game Features:
- Various characters and enemies
- Various weapons
- Interesting locations

item.title: Idle Trillionaire
item.description:
About This Game

Greed Is a Virtue In Idle Trillionaire.



Reach the achievement goals faster than your friends!

Compete to have more money than other players at the 1 year mark and other milestones!
Leverage the prestige system that increases the time rate on subsequent play throughs.

Are you ready to dive into the ultimate idle gaming experience that will redefine your understanding of prosperity? Look no further than Idle Trillionaire, the game that takes the concept of idle games to unprecedented heights! Immerse yourself in a captivating journey where your strategic decisions pave the way for unimaginable riches, all while conquering the virtual world in ways you never thought possible.



🌟 **Build Your Empire:** Begin your ascent to unimaginable wealth by strategically acquiring and upgrading resource-boosting cards. With each card purchase, watch as your earnings of both money and happiness skyrocket, setting the stage for an exponential cascade of riches.

💰 **Unleash Your Potential:** As your wealth accumulates, explore an ever-expanding arsenal of cards that supercharge your earnings even further. Witness as your financial prowess reaches the levels of the world's wealthiest elites, generating millions of dollars per hour effortlessly.

😄 **Collect Happy:** Happiness isn't just a feeling; it's a valuable resource! Accumulate happy points to unlock new dimensions of growth, making each gaming session a joyous and fulfilling experience.

🌍 **Beyond Trillions:** While $1 trillion might seem like an astronomical sum, your ambitions don't have to stop there. Idle Trillionaire dares you to dream bigger – purchase entire countries, continents, and even the entire globe as you solidify your dominance on an unprecedented scale.




Are you ready to embark on a wealth-building adventure that transcends boundaries and defies expectations? Join the ranks of the idle trillionaires and experience the ultimate evolution of idle gaming.

item.title: Try if you can - 100
item.description:
About This Game

About This Game

Defence enemies with a variety of characters
Enemies are coming.
Defend your enemies with your own strategic placement

this game is classic tower defense game.
Each character has unique characteristics.
All you have to do is prevent enemies from penetrating your defenses.
It progresses up to 100 rounds, and you encounter a boss every 10 rounds.
Just That!.

can you do it?

Disclaimer

Otter Games is not responsible for broken keyboards, Broken minds.

Controls

Only Mouse Play Okay~
But Use some keyboards.

[wasd],[arrowkeys] = CameraMove
Mouse wheel = Camera zoom
Key 1,2,3,4,5 = Select Tower
Esc = Pause and Option

item.title: Puzzle Journey
item.description:
About This Game

"Puzzle Journey" is an engaging and fun-filled game that challenges players to sharpen their minds while constructing beautiful landscapes. This isn't just about fitting scattered pieces together to form a complete image; it brings an innovative puzzle-solving experience that combines soothing background music with visually comfortable effects, making it suitable for players of all ages.

Embark on your puzzle adventure, unlocking hidden artworks and revealing the stories behind each painting. Each puzzle is thoughtfully designed to provide a sense of progression and accomplishment as you indulge in the gameplay.

item.title: Iron Line
item.description:
About This Game

As a veteran conductor traversing the IronLine you have been tasked with a final mission. The final station is on the brink of destruction and you are to deliver life-saving cargo.

The IronLine is a unforgiving and harsh environment crawled with bugs and other monstrosities. You have been given permission to use any means necessary to defend your cargo.

With turrets at your disposal you are to travel down the track disposing anything that dares to takes you cargo.
Place, upgrade or even change layouts to reach that final destination.

Student Game

Iron Line is proudly made over the span of 12 weeks by 9 second year students from Breda University of Applied Sciences.

item.title: Checkers RPG: Online Battles
item.description:
About This Game

Experience a new level of strategic gameplay with Checkers RPG Online PVP Battles! This classic board game is reinvented with RPG elements, where players can choose their own hero, upgrade their skills, and battle against other players in real-time PvP matches.

With stunning 3D graphics and immersive sound effects, Checkers RPG Online PVP Battles brings the traditional checkers game to life like never before. Challenge other players from around the world and climb the global rankings to become the ultimate checkers champion.

Unlock new heroes with unique abilities, create your own strategies, and dominate the battlefield with your skills. Join a guild, team up with your friends, and conquer your opponents together.

Are you ready for the ultimate checker's challenge? Game Checkers RPG Online PVP Battles now and prove your skills in the most exciting checkers game!

item.title: Ninja - waltz of night
item.description:
About This Game

"Ninja-Waltz of Night" is an action and roguelike VR game where you embark on a blood-pumping monster-slaying adventure. In the game, you take on the role of a ninja wielding dual blades, slashing through enemies, progressively growing stronger. Come and test how far you can go in clearing stages!

Game Features:

1. Dual Sword Slashes, Swing Freely
Players embody a ninja, wielding dual swords to unleash horizontal and vertical slashes—engage in battles as you please!

2. Charged Ultimate Move, Sword Energy Unleashed
With each swing, accumulate "Sword Energy." Once fully charged, release a powerful sword wave upon your enemies.

3. Diverse Levels, Varied Monsters
Explore a range of enemies, from melee to ranged and summoning monsters—rich defensive strategies await your discovery.

4. Choose Cards, Unlock Skills
At the end of each level, unlock random upgrades and face even more formidable foes!

5. Listen for Positioning, Ears Open on All Sides
Utilize a unique sound positioning gameplay—players must rely on spatial sound effects, listening on all sides to prevent monster flanking attacks.

Quickly pick up your dual swords and embark on the adrenaline-fueled journey of slashing monsters and defeating enemies!

We are an independent game studio passionate about VR. "Ninja-Waltz of Night" is our debut title, and we plan to release more levels, skills, and weapons in the future. Stay tuned for updates!

item.title: Anji -Implication-
item.description:
About This Game

Anji 【Implication】

- Stimulation that gives the mind, unconsciously, certain notions.
This game is a horror walking simulator where you just go down the stairs.

Story

You are about to go home after working overtime.

However, the building's elevators are not in operation.

and you have to go down the emergency stairs from the top floor to get home...

Playthrough Time

15 ~ 20 minute

Game Features

・16:18 vertical play screen
　Vertical play screens look similar to smartphone screens.
　On a normal 16:9 display, black bars appear at both ends of the screen.

・Photorealistic visual effects created with Unreal Engine 5
　Viewing angle, depth of field, etc.
　Visual effects are represented as close as possible to the way the human eye sees.

Uploading and livestreaming Guidelines

Please adhere to the following guidelines when posting or livestreaming game footage:

-Include the game's name in the title of the video or livestream.
-Include the store page URL in the summary or description section of the video or livestream.
-Some of the submitted videos and live streaming footage may be used on the Bunbukuzu Youtube channel.
-Posting or livestreaming content limited to paid members, such as YouTube memberships, is not permitted.
-Bunbukuzu will not be held responsible for any damages incurred by the publisher or any third party resulting from the posting or livestreaming of videos.
-Please note that these guidelines are subject to change without prior notice.

item.title: Pitch Black
item.description:
About This Game

WELCOME SUBJECT!


Go ahead and pick up your toys, we’ll make sure she does her job, just stay out of the light and you’ll be okay. Thank you, everyone, so much for your continued support in the quality assurance of our toys!

STAY OUT OF THE LIGHT




Escape Mary-Anne, a doll developed by The MonolIth Corporation, where lessons are learned through play.

Stay out of the light, flip switches to stay in the dark.

A WELCOMING LAUGH


At Monolith we take pride in the approachability of our series of educational toys.

We found that a calming, welcoming giggle helps children learn through play. That’s why Mary-Anne has been given a warm, kind, and approachable voice and appearance.

item.title: Asteroids Neon
item.description:
About This Game

Prepare for a cosmic revolution in "Asteroids Neon", a remixed version of the legendary Asteroids arcade game. Immerse yourself in a vibrant, retro-futuristic dreamscape, where dazzling neon nightmares come to life, and the void of space is an electrifying playground of explosive mayhem and dazzling hues.

In this pulsating adventure, your sleek, you will encounter a multitude of UFO styles, each with their unique characteristics. Engage in battles against asteroids of varying sizes that threaten to shatter your voyage through the neon-infused cosmos. The celestial battleground is alive with the symphony of explosions, captivating music, and immersive sounds that elevate the gameplay to a whole new level.

Diverse Menagerie of UFO Styles: Encounter a kaleidoscope of UFO styles, each boasting its distinct patterns and behaviors, making every encounter a thrilling challenge that keeps you on the edge of your seat.

Explosive Action and Power-ups: Unleash devastation upon the neon-lit starscape with an arsenal of power-ups at your disposal. Trigger a magnet to attract stars and earn bonus points, harness a singularity to devour asteroids, or activate a destructive beam to obliterate anything in your path.

Color Customization: Express your unique style in the neon cosmos by customizing your environment colors. Personalize every hue and pattern to truly stand out in the electrifying universe of Neon Nebula.

Intense Challenges and Achievements: Push your skills to the limit as you navigate through waves of UFOs and asteroids, aiming for the highest score. Unlock challenging achievements that showcase your prowess in the face of intergalactic danger.

item.title: Reddish
item.description:
About This Game

Storyline:

Reddish is a sidescroller 2.5D action platformer powered by Unreal 5. Each level has a different challenge and a lot of combat, also the world map is highly explorable and hides some dungeons.

Reddish is a solo dev project with some gameplay aspects heavily influenced by old snes platform classics, bringing then to the new generation. The game is powered by Unreal 5 and use assets from Paragon game. New techniques like Nanite and Lumem for global Illumination are widely used.

  • Combat - Action and challenge in a beat 'em up style combat, Reddish can attack and defend with his staff, he can also jump on enemies heads to cause damage and in some levels it has some hidden powers.
  • Exploration - Each level has a lot to explore, in some parts of the game you can find Relic Dungeons which are small hidden maps where Reddish has to beat a wave of enemies to escape and get the reward.

item.title: Animal Kingdom 2
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to Animal Kingdom 2, a hidden animal game where you collect pawprints, cameras and coins while searching animals in fantastic locations! With 3 game modes and trivias and word game between levels, Animal Kingdom 2 will provide hours of fun for Hidden Object fans in colorful jungles and even underwater. Animal Kingdom 2 is waiting for you in this unique hidden object game!

item.title: Mutant Frog
item.description:
About This Game

As a result of an unknown meteorite hitting an unknown planet, a poisonous gas began to spread on the planet. This gas began to mutate animals on the planet.

Two frogs and a pig that developed as a result of this mutation experienced the first effects of the meteorite impact.

The pig sees the two frogs and becomes jealous of them, and our adventure begins to unfold. Simple platform game


Prepare to fight in the world of Mutant Frog. Push your flying skills to the limit as you jump across dangerous passages and spiky obstacles.
Lots of levels with unique soundtracks!
Meticulously designed 16-bit sprites, animations, and backgrounds in the spirit of the classics.

During this mutation process, you may also start using weapons.

-Story mode contains 25+ levels spread over 5+ chapters, levels can be unlocked.
-Secret 5 World and 25 Level.
-Epic Boss fight

item.title: Asgard's Fall: Origins
item.description:
About This Game



DISCLAIMER

Asgard's Fall: Origins is an early pre-release version of the game. We're actively working on a new and much more improved version which includes recreating the game in an all-new engine, also adding even more amazing gameplay features and improvements. So, if you enjoyed playing the Origin version, please consider wishlisting the full game on Steam! Thank you for being a part of our journey!


Embark on an epic saga in Asgard's Fall, a norse Survivors-like Roguelite. Fight your way through hordes of creatures and let the gods feel your relentless wrath. How will your saga unfold?



Master the art of combat with the dynamic Ability System. Choose from a diverse array of skills, each tailored to your playstyle. Unleash devastating attacks, strategic buffs, and unique powers to conquer the Nine Realms. Forge your warrior's destiny!



Control the magic of ancient runes with our Rune Carving System. Craft your destiny by engraving powerful runes onto relics, enhancing your power on your way to conquer Asgard.



Shape your warrior's evolution with our intricate Skill Tree. Customize your playstyle by unlocking diverse abilities, enhancing strengths, and adapting to challenges. Every choice influences your saga's outcome. Craft a hero uniquely suited to your journey through the nine Realms!

item.title: Fighting breakthrough
item.description:
About This Game

Fighting breakthrough is an exciting game in which you take on the role of a soldier who must fight his way through enemy forces and complete his mission. Exciting levels filled with shooting, dynamic battles and intense combat missions await you.

In the game you will find various missions, ranging from secret operations, special tasks and ending with participation in combat battles. You will use a variety of weapons, tactical skills and strategic thinking to overcome obstacles and defeat your enemies.

The game is a 2D platformer. You need to destroy enemies and complete tasks to progress through the story.

Game Features:
- Pixel graphics
- Various enemies and weapons
- Nice soundtrack

item.title: 放學後(After school)
item.description:
About This Game

After School is a short visual novel about an elementary school student who encounters an injured old woman on her way home from school, who begs her to help her walk home, and thus begins a frightening adventure...

The game is presented in a cute cartoon style, describing a bloody social case, and skillfully integrating monsters from folk tales to enhance the story tension. A dilapidated old house, a set of poor children's souls waiting for you to release.
Facing the inhuman old woman in front of you, what horrible secrets are hidden behind her?

How to play: *The story progresses through the game.

*The story progresses mainly by mouse clicks.
*The fighting system uses the arrow keys for fun dodging and avoidance.
*Automatic archiving mechanism.

item.title: Deep Scanner
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to the BAORA9 production facility! Your goal is to collect items extracted from the facility and deliver them to reach the required quota for leaving the structure. Beware of the "local creatures," monsters that will raid the facility through the ventilation ducts during your work sessions. Each level features a different creature, each requiring a unique approach to survive. Use a limited battery scanner to detect monsters, managing it wisely to avoid being defenseless.

The facility is divided into three rings. You can close the doors of various zones to protect yourself and block local creatures during the game. Keep track of the number of managed zones, as losing too many will slow down item production, making it harder to reach the quota to abandon the structure.

Your survival depends on your intuition, wit, and skills. Can you find the right strategy, manage resources intelligently, and leave the BAORA9 production facility unscathed?

item.title: BULLRING
item.description:
About This Game

--- Bullring, the arena filled with crazy monsters. You as a warrior with your powerful weapons, magic, abilities, and most important; the skills. ---

• Choose your fighting style. Be a sword master and enjoy slashing the enemies, use heavy weapons to quake the ring, or use the magic and never get close to these
creatures!
• Show the special ultimate of your equipment, use intelligence for the next step, plan your charge or defence, run the ring for gift of trees to get some potions, jump inside wells to get so far from the danger.
• Some attacks of these things really can break everything just in seconds. How it feels to have a flipped view of world, or all is black, never stand in the same plot with the earthquake of hell, get slowed or stuck to the ground inside dozens of them, you need to act really faster before it!
• A lot of things for you to destroy the enemy, even a magical phone that calls the your allies for incredible firepower!
• Not over yet, though you used all of that, and nothing is left to use, time to call your big friends to the ring.
• A dragon from another world, and the scary mutant is ready to smash every time for your service!
• And after these, the gods of the bullring incomes! Each one has very challenging skills, so it's hard to bring an end!

--- Right now, it's time to decide how to encounter, get face to face with these, beat them and be the real god of this world! ---

item.title: BoboInvasion
item.description:
About This Game

bobo Alien Invasion!

You are the spearhead of the defense fleet, and you will lead the charge to defeat the bobo alien.

Can You Defeat them and Win A High Score?


  • Total 9 levels, 3 bosses, 6 kinds of enemies
  • 5 upgrade systems
  • classic graphics and sound effects

item.title: Free Video Converter
item.description:
About This Software

All-in-one powerful free video converter software.High Definition Video Converter This video converter allows you to decode and encode high definition videos like MPEG2/MPEG-4 TS HD, HD WMV, FLV,MKV, AVCHD (*.m2ts, *.mts), H.264/MPEG-4 AVC, HD ASF, HD VOB, HD WMV, HD MPEG4, HD MPEG2 TS, HD MPEG2, and HD AVI. item.title: My Furry Protogen 2 🐾
item.description:
About This Game



My Furry Protogen 2 continues the story of a protogen scientist named Juno and her love - our main hero. After two years of training, preparation and research, they have finally found some clues that could help them find their enemy. With some outside help, new equipment and a new armor for Juno, they are now more than ready to continue their mission!

The relationship between our heroes has also gotten stronger - they love each other more than anything and spend all their time together, but even their relationship has some minor problems. Although they solve them easily, things are starting to heat up for both of them, as it seems that their interests and hobbies are a bit different. Will they be able to overcome this stage of their relationship or will it get even worse?

Continue the story of Juno and our hero, discover new planets and face new dangers in My Furry Protogen 2!

Features:

• Cute female protogen!
• HD fully original artworks.
• Relaxing atmosphere.
• Some personal drama, as usual.
